thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: JohnG
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by JohnG

author: JohnG
title: JohnG
text:
Overall experience was good and I will use Redspot again,
My only 'bad experience' was i had to wait almost 30 minutes to be served as there was only one staff member at the Sunshine Coast airport and i had 3 people in front of me waiting.
I had similar experience when returning the car, i had to wait 15 minutes because there was only one staff member on duty.
Apart from that, it was all good. Car was in great condition.
